feed.title: Workout Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add back a number of icons that went missing by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/378
  • Bump templates generated by templ by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/379
  • Convert the pages into a shared template by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/381
  • Improve the page options for scripts and stylesheets by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/382
  • fix(user): Set context of user from request by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/384
  • Always show workout details in lists by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/385

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.0.0...v2.0.1

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Refactor(template): Remove duplicate footer from statistics page by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/386
  • Refactor(views): Improve workout and route segment name display by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/389
  • refactor(converters): Improve name detection by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/390
  • Fix(gpx): Handle GPX files without track names by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/391
  • Upgrade go.mod to v2 by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/393
  • Implement simple query caching by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/394

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.0.1...v2.0.2

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update readme by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/395
  • Add resources for route segments by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/396
  • Add route segment tests by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/397
  • Finnish translations by @tphakala in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/398
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/400
  • Refactor(build): Rename binary and restructure project by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/403
  • feat(database): Improve statistics query by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/404
  • Add a debugger tool by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/405
  • Add generic diagnose command by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/407

New Contributors

  • @tphakala made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/398

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.0.2...v2.0.3

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.1.0
entry.content:
Breaking change for imperial unit users!

Weights stored in the database since this release are now correctly converted from the user's preferred unit (kilograms or pounds). However, the weights stored before this release were not converted before storing. If you entered "10 pounds", it was stored as "10 kg" but shown as "10 pounds". This means that data entered before this release will be wrong. What was 10 pounds will now show 22 pounds...

If you want to update all weights in the workout table (eg. all your users use pounds), you can run this single query:

sql update map_data set total_weight = total_weight * 2.20462262;

What's Changed

  • chore(deps): bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 6.1.1 to 6.2.0 in the all group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/408
  • fix(database): Handle zero duration in workout average speed calculation by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/409
  • feat(import): Implement export and import CLI commands by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/410
  • fix(app): Fix redirect URLs after workout creation by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/415
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/413
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/414
  • chore(deps): bump the all group with 5 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/418
  • chore(deps): bump actions/setup-go from 5.2.0 to 5.3.0 in the all group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/416
  • Bump all dependencies by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/419
  • fix(filter): Update the unscoped value for the since filter by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/420
  • Development improvements by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/422
  • Ignore templ watch files by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/423
  • Bug fixes and debugging tools by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/424
  • feat(api): Add endpoint to create manual workouts by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/425
  • Add daily measurements by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/427
  • chore(deps): bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 6.2.0 to 6.3.2 in the all group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/426
  • Improve the measurement conversions and interface by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/428
  • Update changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/430

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.0.3...v2.1.0

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fitbit sync cli by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/429
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/431
  • fix(build): Improve Docker build process by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/432
  • Update all dependencies by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/433
  • feat(Fitbit): Sync recent activities from Fitbit by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/434
  • fix(Fitbit): Improve error handling from the Fitbit API by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/435
  • Update README and screenshots by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/436
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/437
  • chore(config): Remove nakedret override configuration by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/440
  • chore(deps): bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 6.3.2 to 6.5.0 in the all group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/439
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/438
  • feat(cli): Add granular control over Fitbit data syncing by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/441
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/443
  • Add Simplified Chinese as a language by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/444
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/445
  • fix(translations): Rename the file containing Simplified Chinese tran… by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/446
  • Refactor(i18n): Rename Norwegian translation file by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/447
  • fix(database): Set User in Workouts and Equipment by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/449
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/450
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/451
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/453
  • fix(profile): Remove name attribute from api_key input field by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/454
  • Update screenshot script to k6 v0.52+ by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/455
  • Generate screenshots from separate database by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/456
  • chore(deps): bump the all group with 4 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/457
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/458

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.1.0...v2.1.1
